- I choose hare, other chooses stag: I get 4, other gets 1

- If I choose hare: 2 if other chooses hare, 4 if other chooses stag

- It protects me from the worst outcome (getting only 1 point)
- If they choose stag (cooperative), I get 4 points which is good


- If they also choose hare, we both get 2 points which is acceptable
